text:
I was reminded of this track when I heard "Up for the Challenge" in Final Fantasy XV's OST.
This game is so underrated. Great world and music.

text: motoi sakuraba made the eternal sonata ost... well all the ones that were not already done by Chopin. The french horn,bass violin,and drawn out angelic vocals seem to be his bread and butter.
